successes.title: Lukla Endeavour- Outerwear for the 21st Century Adventurer
successes.description: Using NASA space suit technology, Lukla brings you the Endeavour- the thinnest, warmest, and most breathable jacket of its kind.

Pledges.description: LUKLA: This is the starting point for each adventurer who dares to climb the world's highest peak, Mt. Everest. It's also the starting point in supporting our journey as a company.
For this pledge, receive our ETERNAL THANKS for your support and stay updated with our progress!
BONUS: We will write your name in our own personal jackets so we can always remember your support!
BASE CAMP: Congratulations, you've taken the first step on your journey to summit Everest!
For this pledge, you receive a Lukla logo VINYL STICKER to put on your skis, laptop, car, board, or wherever else!
KHUMBU ICEFALL: This Icefall is the first of many dangerous and beautiful points along your ascent.
For this pledge, you will get a Lukla VINYL STICKER and a limited edition Lukla T-SHIRT.
CAMP I: As you climb higher, temperatures get colder. Don't let the fear of frostbite immobilize you.
For this pledge, you get a VINYL STICKER, a Lukla T-SHIRT, and a Lukla TRUCKER HAT.
CAMP II (EARLY BIRD):  You're climbing faster than the rest and it's true the Early bird gets the worm.
For this pledge, you'll receive your very own ENDEAVOUR JACKET at an EARLY BIRD PRICE, reserved for our EARLIEST supporters!
Holiday Special: National Walk in the Park Day
